data.name: Pandora
data.description: ERP Application in PyQt5 and PostgreSQL relational database system.  Python3 powered. Interface: Sqlalchemy-Core.  Modules: Inventory, Sales, Purchase, Manufactory, Employees, Calculation, Accountancy (portal), Payroll administration, Management modules for inventory control and financial control with graphs are included.  For documentation and database structure see Documentation directory.  For instructions, installation and several screenshots see Installation directory.
